attributes.action: To Ban Credit Card Advertisements through the Post and on Television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many Britons are in floundering debt! millions upon millions - and they have to turn to debt consolidators, IVA's and even bankruptcy because credit card companies bombard you with adverts through the post from the day you turn 18 (are you really responsible at that age to be in debt for the next goodness knows how many years) and TV ads constantly pounding it into consumers that credit is a good idea. Help Britons out of debt and ban credit card advertising!
